SEARCH
Module org.junit.platform.engine
Package org.junit.platform.engine

Interface DiscoveryIssue

@API(status=EXPERIMENTAL, since="1.13") public interface DiscoveryIssue
DiscoveryIssue represents an issue that was encountered during test discovery by a TestEngine.
Since:
1.13

      static DiscoveryIssue create(DiscoveryIssue.Severity severity, String message)
